mk.tmdb.entity.image

Class TMDbImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • mk.tmdb.entity.TMDbEntity
      • mk.tmdb.entity.image.TMDbImage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TMDbBackdrop, TMDbLogo, TMDbPoster, TMDbProfile

    public abstract class TMDbImage
extends TMDbEntity
    Abstract class that represents an image.
    Author:
    Mirko Polato

      • getUrl

        public java.net.URL getUrl(TMDbSize size)
                    throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                           TMDbConfigurationNotLoadedException,
                           TMDbImageSizeNotSupportedException
        Gets the image URL.
        Parameters:
        size - The image size
        Returns:
        The image URL
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - Throws if the URL is in a wrong form.
        TMDbConfigurationNotLoadedException - Throws if the configuration information are not loaded.
        TMDbImageSizeNotSupportedException - Throws if the given image size is not supported.
